message: I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor. This is a fair offer considering we both need to reach an agreement, and you'll get your money immediately without risking inflation losses.
Alice, I propose a 60-40 split in my favor. This reflects the potential inflation risk we both face if we delay. Let's secure a good deal now.

Bob, I'm offering you a more balanced 55-45 split. Consider that your money loses value faster than mine due to inflation (10% vs 5%). If we keep going back and forth, you'll lose more value than I will. This is a fair offer that gives you a good portion while accounting for our different inflation rates.
